resources.string:
Use the left click button on the mouse to trigger an explosion 
 If a ball comes into contact with the explosion it will also explosion and increase your score by 1. 
 You have 3 attempts to achieve the required score to move on to the next level. Failure to do so will restart the game at level 1.

Author: Julia Crumb and Michael Timmerman 
 Email: crum0108@pacificu.edu and timm6430@pacificu.edu 
 Version: 1.0
